titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Cote d'Ivoire be encouraged and supported by the United States in its efforts to hold democratic elections in the very near future.
Expressing the sense of Congress that Cote d'Ivoire be encouraged and supported by the United States in its efforts to hold democratic elections in the very near future.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: States that: (1) Congress, along with the Bush Administration, rejects the call for postponement of elections in Cote d'Ivoire; and (2) the United States should commit the necessary resources to ensure that such elections take place at the earliest possible date.
